file_content.text: It's done. Brogon is all yours.
Ex-Colonel Brogon has officially been killed in action. Here's the proof.
The crew is dealt with--it's time to go after Brogon.
Brogon's crew doesn't mess around, but I managed to catch one of them for you.
You can scratch one of Brogon's crew off your list.
Are you Ariavos? I'm here about the bounty posting.
At last. Thank you for coming--I have all of the information here.
Colonel Brogon. Ex-colonel Brogon. He's got a whole pack of ex-soldiers who extort credits from refugees and citizens alike. Those who won't pay are beaten... or worse.
Their extortion ends today. I'll see to it.
They'll face justice.
Then I'll pay handsomely.
Anyone who works for Brogon is dead, starting now.
I'll wipe them out.
Have you taken this to the local authorities?
Did you try official channels?
Of course! How do you think he became "ex" colonel Brogon? That didn't stop him... it only made things worse....
I've watched. I've seen everywhere those scum go, and everyone they talk to. With what I've learned, you'll have no problem finding them.
Good. Let them see what it's like.
Just be careful. These men are killers--they won't hesitate. I learned that firsthand....
Finally, real results. You don't know how much this means.
Dead? Good. It's no more than that scum deserves.
Here's your fee. There's plenty more where that came from, if you're interested in taking down more of Brogon's thugs.
Perfect. Thanks to you, we have everything we need to find him.
Brogon loves to make people watch while he... he kills their families. I wish I could watch while you do the same to him.
At last.... he'll finally face true punishment for what he's done.
Adani, Torin, Vara... you finally have the justice you deserve.
Thank you. Thank you so much.
He was so sure that he would never be punished. That no one would ever touch him.
